title: Did Native American Scouts’ Long Hair Provide “Almost Supernatural” Tracking Abilities During the Vietnam War?
subtitle: Native American trackers were supposedly recruited by the U.S. military for service during the Vietnam War.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The United States military recruited Native Americans as scouts in the Vietnam War and — in the course of their training — the military discovered that long hair actually helps give people ‘almost supernatural’ tracking abilities.
